atDirectives.name: @tailwind
atDirectives.description: Use the @tailwind directive to insert Tailwind's base, components, utilities and screens styles into your CSS.

atDirectives.name: @apply
atDirectives.description: Use @apply to inline any existing utility classes into your own custom CSS.

atDirectives.name: @layer
atDirectives.description: Use the @layer directive to tell Tailwind which 'bucket' a set of custom styles belong to.

atDirectives.name: @variants
atDirectives.description: Use the @variants directive to generate responsive, hover, focus, and other variants of your own utilities.

atDirectives.name: @responsive
atDirectives.description: Use the @responsive directive to generate responsive variants of your own utilities.

atDirectives.name: @screen
atDirectives.description: Use the @screen directive to create media queries that reference your breakpoints by name.
